Notes.Text:
This update for avahi fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-38471: Fixed reachable assertion in dbus_set_host_name (bsc#1216594).
- CVE-2023-38469: Fixed reachable assertions in avahi (bsc#1216598).
Notes.Title: Details
